title: mod崩溃！！！
author: 303HIM
txt_content:
---- Minecraft崩溃报告 ----
// Quite honestly, I wouldn't worry myself about that.

Time: 19-3-18 ????5:37
崩溃类型： There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

请各位大佬帮助一下

replies.author: 晴天娃娃_
replies.txt_content:
UE        mcheli{1.0} [mcheli] (.minecraft) 
直升机mod问题，可能是兼容性，找一个符合forge版本的mod换上

replies.author: 帕帕武
replies.txt_content:
三楼回答正确
UE= unloaded Errored =加载错误

建议到帖内重下[站内链接没了只有站外]
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-426651-1-1.html
